name: sandbagger-scoring
description: Golf tournament scoring and leaderboard application

scripts.clean: rm -rf www/* && mkdir -p www/api www/icons www/images www/js www/css
scripts.copy:core: cp index.html script.js style.css manifest.json service-worker.js favicon.png www/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.copy:admin: cp admin.php tournament-assign.html www/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r js css www/
scripts.build:user: npm run clean && npm run copy:core && npm run copy:php && npm run copy:dirs
scripts.build: npm run build:user && npm run copy:admin
scripts.sync:user: npm run build:user && npx cap sync
scripts.sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
